title: cross compile for armv7-linux-androideabi : llvm archive panic

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
run `PKG_CONFIG_ALLOW_CROSS=1 RUST_BACKTRACE=full OPENSSL_STATIC=1  cargo build --target armv7-linux-androideabi`, but got：

```
 Compiling openssl-sys v0.9.58
   Compiling openssl v0.10.30
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/librustc_codegen_llvm/back/archive.rs:274:33
stack backtrace:
   0:        0x10155a9ff - <std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::DisplayBacktrace as core::fmt::Display>::fmt::h8ad47541fb823094
   1:        0x10159480e - core::fmt::write::he23e9bd6497f06c3
   2:        0x10154b997 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h91528f1131e6004e
   3:        0x10155f51a - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h1983f014a45a477e
   4:        0x10155f25c - std::panicking::default_hook::hb0d9b93b5be8b120
   5:        0x1073fb468 - rustc_driver::report_ice::h84533b6a88900192
   6:        0x10155fc35 - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::h9f3faafe0983de5c
   7:        0x10155f722 - rust_begin_unwind
   8:        0x1015b7c0f - core::panicking::panic_fmt::h0a2d1b3ca0b14316
   9:        0x1015b7b67 - core::panicking::panic::hfb3ef93dcafb964c
  10:        0x10779f3cc - <rustc_codegen_llvm::back::archive::LlvmArchiveBuilder as rustc_codegen_ssa::back::archive::ArchiveBuilder>::build::hc580373cd62aa4a0
  11:        0x107855d2a - rustc_session::utils::<impl rustc_session::session::Session>::time::h025ae1e1a04b4380
  12:        0x10784fb5e - <rustc_codegen_llvm::LlvmCodegenBackend as rustc_codegen_ssa::traits::backend::CodegenBackend>::link::h26445a09563b0340
  13:        0x10774a3ff - rustc_interface::queries::Linker::link::h5e0477f45d3bef5a
  14:        0x107553843 - rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler_in_existing_thread_pool::hd829e895df89177a
  15:        0x107403bd9 - scoped_tls::ScopedKey<T>::set::h6f8ab04b28c4ee8b
  16:        0x1074009f5 - rustc_ast::attr::with_globals::h060f2af0de393ae8
  17:        0x107408bf7 - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::h64c714e2f59a2735
  18:        0x107555d5c - core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once{{vtable.shim}}::h4c8339bc7eb21f00
  19:        0x10156e26d - std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::hcced3d366a7ed1a7
  20:     0x7fff776af2eb - AssociationsManager::_map
  21:     0x7fff776b2249 - AssociationsManager::_map

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.44.1 (c7087fe00 2020-06-17) running on x86_64-apple-darwin

note: compiler flags: -C debuginfo=2 -C linker=/Users/zhongdusheng/.NDK/arm/bin/arm-linux-androideabi-clang --crate-type lib

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

query stack during panic:
end of query stack
error: could not compile `openssl-sys`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.

```
